item.title: Lullaby
item.description: :|: Byssan lull -- boil the full kettle, the treasure chest has three figures. :|: The first one is our faith the second one is hope, the third one is the red love. -- Evert Taube

item.title: Why I'd rather not be an intellectual.
item.description: An intellectual is a man who says a simple thing in a difficult way; an artist is a man who says a difficult thing in a simple way. â€” Charles Bukowski
